segments.text: Hello . What can I do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . Fill it up please . Premium .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , can you check my oil and tires while you're at it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . I'm gonna need you to turn off your engine and open the hood for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your oil is fine but your tires are a little flat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . Where can I add some air to my tires ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right here . I'll do it for you . ( Three minutes later ) Your car's ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . How much does it come to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nine gallons of premium . That's $ 15.32 , please .
segments.speaker: S1
